ping.name: ping
ping.desc: Ping the bot, returns time in milliseconds

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.desc: Returns a user or your avatar URL

uptime.name: uptime
uptime.desc: Returns the uptime of the bot

help.name: help
help.desc: Returns help message of all commands or of a specific command

botsend.name: botsend
botsend.desc: Send a message to a channel or user as the bot

snowflake.name: snowflake
snowflake.desc: Returns the snowflake info on a user ID

hackmud_chats.name: hackmud_chats
hackmud_chats.desc: Periodically logs hackmud messages from in-game
